item.title: Almost Done with User System
item.description: All that needs wrapped up is the 'Account Info' page. I should have login, logout, change password, forgot password, forgot username, and deactivate account complete
item.author: patches@rockthepatch.com (Patches)

item.title: Updates and Upgrades to the Site
item.description: Added a new page to house the old updates for the website, fixed a lot of validation issues, fixed some broken links and pages, and did some quality control testing :)
item.author: patches@rockthepatch.com (Patches)

item.title: Renewal of Rock the Patch Domain and Hosting
item.description: Renewed with go Daddy to keep the site open for another year and added a link to show I'm certified.

item.title: Thursday's Open Mic at Ole Simms
